args.natural_language_statement: Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and f'(z) ‚â† 0 for every z ‚àà U. Show that f is locally injective on U. Formalize this in Lean4 (import Mathlib) and end the statement with := by sorry.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí E is differentiable at x with nonzero derivative, then f is locally injective near x.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib
open Set
variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

theorem differentiable_at_nonzero_deriv_locally_injective {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí E} {x : ‚Ñù} (h : HasDerivAt f (f' x) x) (h' : f' x ‚â† 0) : ‚àÉ U, IsOpen U ‚àß x ‚àà U ‚àß InjOn f U := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Set Filter Metric Complex
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and f'(z) ‚â† 0 for every z ‚àà U. Show that f is locally injective on U. -/
theorem locally_injective_of_deriv_ne_zero {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U) {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U)
    (hf' : ‚àÄ z ‚àà U, deriv f z ‚â† 0) : LocallyInjectiveOn f U := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set Filter Topology
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and f'(z) ‚â† 0 for every z ‚àà U. Show that f is locally injective on U. -/
theorem locally_injective_of_deriv_ne_zero {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U) {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U)
    (hf' : ‚àÄ z ‚àà U, deriv f z ‚â† 0) : ‚àÄ z ‚àà U, ‚àÉ V, IsOpen V ‚àß z ‚àà V ‚àß V ‚äÜ U ‚àß Set.InjOn f V := by sorry
